welcomeMessage: Welcome to Echo Mind - College Info

topicsInfo.admissions: Admissions are conducted via DTE Maharashtra CAP. For first-year, eligibility is 12th Science PCM with MHT-CET or JEE. For direct second year, diploma with 45% (general) or 40% (reserved) is required.
topicsInfo.departments: SNJB COE has departments like Civil, Computer, Mechanical, E&TC, AI & Data Science, and MBA, each headed by experienced faculty.
topicsInfo.placements: The Placement Cell invites recruiters like TCS, Infosys, and Wipro. The highest package is ₹10 LPA, average is ₹3.2 LPA.
topicsInfo.facilities: Facilities include Smart Classrooms, Labs, Library, Auditorium, WiFi, Hostel, Canteen, ATM, Gym, Medical, Transport, and Sports Complex.
topicsInfo.vision: To transform young learners through quality education focused on creativity and professionalism for societal growth.
topicsInfo.clubs: Students can join clubs like Coding Club, Robotics Club, Entrepreneurship Cell, NSS, and Cultural Club.
topicsInfo.achievements: Recognized with NAAC A+ (2023), NBA Accreditation, Best Rural Engineering College Award, and AICTE-CII Innovation Award.
topicsInfo.programs: UG Programs: Civil, Computer, Mechanical, E&TC, AI & DS. PG: MBA and M.Tech (Comp Engg). First Year is common.
topicsInfo.hostel: Separate hostels for boys and girls, with Wi-Fi, mess, 24/7 security, medical support, and gym facilities.

basic_info.name: SNJB's Late Sau. K. B. Jain College of Engineering, Chandwad

vision_mission.vision: Transform young aspirant learners towards creativity and professionalism for societal growth through quality technical education.
mission: Transfer suitable technology, particularly for rural development.
Enhance diverse career opportunities among students.
Bridge gap between industry and academics.
Encourage value-based education and professional ethics.
